title: Ultimate NASCAR Trivia Quiz - Part 4
description: Welcome to The Trivia Showdown! Part 4 of our NASCAR Trivia Quiz brings you 50 fresh and challenging questions about NASCAR drivers, tracks, history, and more! Test your knowledge and see if you have what it takes to claim the trivia checkered flag!

questions.question: Who holds the record for the most NASCAR Cup Series championships?
questions.answer: Richard Petty, Dale Earnhardt, and Jimmie Johnson (7 each)
